meanings.sent1: The bijugate leaves on the plant were very symmetrical.
meanings.sent2: The bijugate pattern on the butterfly's wings was striking.
meanings.sent3: The bijugate leaves looked like little green wings fluttering in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The bijugate design on the fabric added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the bijugate leaves for their unique shape.

meanings.sent1: The bijugate flowers in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The bijugate columns of the building added a sense of balance.
meanings.sent3: The bijugate chairs in the room seemed to be dancing together.
meanings.sent4: The bijugate flags fluttered in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The bijugate windows framed the view perfectly.
